history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving directions
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go? For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER Press B garage
TTS What is your destination?For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER UPMC Presby garage
TTS Okay, going to upmc presbyterian. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER No.
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 10:53 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 6 minutes. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head west on Forbes avenue toward Zebina Way. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto south Dithridge Street </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left onto Fifth avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Continue straight to stay on Fifth avenue. Pass by Starbucks . . </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Lothrop Street </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Turn right at Victoria Street Destination will be on the left. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
